entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming west 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
